REUTERS.UNKNOWN: G f1656 reute r f BC-LONDON-GRAIN-FREIGHTS 04-09 0096

TEXT.TITLE: LONDON GRAIN FREIGHTS
TEXT.BODY: 27,000 long tons USG/Taiwan 23.25 dlrs fio five days/1,500 1-10/5 Continental. Trade Banner - 30,000 long tons grain USG/Morocco 13.50 dlrs 5,000/5,000 end-April/early-May Comanav. Reference New York Grain Freights 1 of April 8, ship brokers say the vessel fixed by Cam from the Great Lakes to Algeria at 28 dlrs is reported to be the Vamand Wave. Reference New York Grain Freights 2 of April 8, they say the Cory Grain maize business from East London at 22 dlrs is to Japan and not to Spain as reported. Reuter
